creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: night view with silhouette of large ocean liner with lights in portholes; smaller boats in foreground
inscription: left: 自摺　昭和拾三年作　港之夜 {jizuri, Shōwa jūsannen saku, Minato no yoru} | bottom, printed: Night in the Harbor | in pencil: Hiroshi Yoshida
markings: LRC, red artist\'s seal A: 博 {Hiroshi}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Night in the Harbor
